subject: Soccer
Bribery and Kickbacks
lead_paragraph: Despite a series of allegations of corruption, the 24-man executive committee of soccer’s governing body retains a culture of favors and perks, if not outright bribery.
snippet: Despite a series of allegations of corruption, the 24-man executive committee of soccer’s governing body retains a culture of favors and perks, if not outright bribery.
